body: If a link between two planes can be created at any point, the two planes are coexistent. These planes overlap each other completely. A coexistent plane can be reached from anywhere on the plane it overlaps. When moving on a coexistent plane, it is often possible to see into or interact with the plane with which it coexists.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Environment/The Planes/How Planes Interact/Coexistent Planes
name: Coexistent Planes
